COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134
STRING: [Chris] “How would you like to practice together today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160
STRING: Chris invited me to practice with slight hesitation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c
STRING: After our last practice, things had gotten kind of
awkward between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182
STRING: Chris's reply was so blunt that I knew what he was
thinking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198
STRING: I didn't mind if he was doing it for my sister.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4
STRING: But at the very least, I wanted him to stop showing that
to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4
STRING: I would have allowed it if he had written it in a letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: I was able to be normal with him in the cafeteria, but as
we practiced together, I had to steel myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8
STRING: [Chris] “You told me to invite you anytime.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e
STRING: [Torta] “That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? So, what did you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274
STRING: [Chris] “No... I'm not, like, trying to force you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a
STRING: [Torta] “Listen... That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc
STRING: [Chris] “So, what did you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d2
STRING: [Torta] “Why are you inviting me, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f0
STRING: [Chris] “It's... Because I'm looking for a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x306
STRING: [Torta] “So I'm a candidate?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338
STRING: [Chris] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e
STRING: [Torta] “Do you really want me as your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x380
STRING: [Chris] “If I didn't want you at all, I wouldn't ask you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x396
STRING: [Torta] “At all... At all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c8
STRING: [Chris] “Do you not like the uncertainty?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3de
STRING: [Torta] “No... So, will you answer a question? Who are
you partnering up with me for, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fe
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x414
STRING: Chris was listening to me silently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x420
STRING: But I knew the reason well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42c
STRING: [Torta] “Did Arie say something to you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44a
STRING: [Chris] “She did say something... But that's not why.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460
STRING: [Torta] “So would you pair up with whomever Arie says?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x492
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a8
STRING: [Torta] “Fine... Let's practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: Chris followed me apologetically as I stood up from the
chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f4
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x500
STRING: There really wasn't any reason for Chris to apologize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50c
STRING: Did Arie say something to you?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x518
STRING: No.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x524
STRING: I said it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x530
STRING: I made it look like Arie said that, manipulating Chris's
feelings, and now I was getting irritated by it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x566
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57c
STRING: Chris was following me as I hurried along.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: But I couldn't turn around and apologize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59e
STRING: I couldn't admit it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5aa
STRING: My feeling of regret towards Chris and my irritation at
myself wouldn't let me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c0
STRING: So I continued talking with my back to him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5cc
STRING: [Torta] “You said you wanted to practice, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: [Chris] “That's true, but you know what I mean, don't
you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: Then I stopped.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62e
STRING: [Torta] “I know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x644
STRING: I really did know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: [Chris] “If... If you don't want to, Torta, you don't have

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66e
STRING: [Torta] “But you don't understand me, Chris. I'm not
saying I don't want to partner up with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: Then I told another lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b0
STRING: I created a new lie so that the old lie wouldn't be
discovered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c6
STRING: The truth mixed in it didn't help me at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d2
STRING: [Torta] “But... I was just thinking that if you were going
to practice with me right after Arie said something, I
would have liked it if you'd chosen me earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x704
STRING: [Chris] “Then... What should I do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71a
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... Do you understand what I just said? I'm
in the wrong here. I just got mad for my own reasons.
So forget it, sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x744
STRING: And, which one was true...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x750
STRING: I couldn't even know which one was how I truly felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x766
STRING: Was this a kind lie?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x772
STRING: Or was it my true feelings?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x786
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79c
STRING: [Torta] “Getting it all off my chest made me feel better...
So let's practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7bc
STRING: And, that was definitely a lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c8
STRING: I wasn't saying anything to Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d4
STRING: I told lie after lie, it was like I had forgotten how to tell
the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f2
STRING: [Chris] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x808
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x82a
STRING: We made up temporarily in the deserted hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x836
STRING: As we pulled ourselves together and walked toward the
practice room, Chris stopped and looked behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88a
STRING: [Cordell] “You two are pretty funny.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8bc
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: [Cordell] “It was tough to figure out when I should show
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x922
STRING: [Chris] “So you were listening...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x940
STRING: [Cordell] “I heard you, to be more specific.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: Had she heard everything we just said?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x97e
STRING: [Chris] “W-Well, we're going to practice so excuse us.
Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99e
STRING: [Torta] “Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c8
STRING: [Cordell] “Do you have a minute before that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f2
STRING: Ms. Cordell stopped us as we tried to scurry off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: [Chris] “Wh-What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa42
STRING: [Cordell] “It seems you've been practicing with Tortinita
a lot lately.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa74
STRING: [Chris] “How did you know that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa6
STRING: [Cordell] “That doesn't matter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabc
STRING: Why?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac8
STRING: Because I had told Ms. Cordell about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad4
STRING: I was worried about Chris, so I had a long talk with Ms.
Cordell without his knowledge.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: The partner that Ms. Cordell had chosen to introduce to
Chris as a last resort was none other than me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb00
STRING: But I wanted to hide that until the last second.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0c
STRING: If Chris chose someone else, that couldn't be helped,
but there was no reason to think about that at the
moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2c
STRING: It seemed that Ms. Cordell wasn't planning on telling
Chris, for another reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5e
STRING: [Cordell] “Anyway, how about you show me your
practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb90
STRING: [Chris] “You... You mean now? But it's time for Asino's
lesson.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbcc
STRING: [Cordell] “Asino just asked me if he could take today's
lesson off. So I'm free now and I came looking for you,
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: [Chris] “Asino did? Umm... So you were looking for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc30
STRING: [Cordell] “You're together with Tortinita. Will you let me
hear?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc58
STRING: [Chris] “Our performance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: [Cordell] “I don't think I'd want to hear anything else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcbc
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd2
STRING: Chris looked at my face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcde
STRING: Had he decided what to do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcea
STRING: If so...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd12
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: I was going to give my answer, but Chris blurted this
out before I had the chance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5a
STRING: [Chris] “Is it alright, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd70
STRING: [Torta] “I don't mind...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8e
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, then. So, is the classroom alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb6
STRING: [Cordell] “Yeah. I've gotten it all ready, so let's go right
in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdde
STRING: [Chris] “Understood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf4
STRING: There was no hesitation in that voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe08
STRING: What made him that way?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe54
STRING: [Cordell] “Now then, please begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6a
STRING: I got everything ready, and faced Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe98
STRING: I nodded silently, giving the sign that I was ready
whenever he was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb6
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, here we go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: [Cordell] “Quite good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4e
STRING: Ms. Cordell looked at us, and said this in her usual tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf64
STRING: It took me a while to get used to it, but it seemed that
was her highest form of praise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7a
STRING: She'd heard me sing many times, but she'd never said
that to me before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf90
STRING: But... Listening to Chris's Fortelle and singing over it,
even I knew why.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa6
STRING: That music was worthy of praise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb2
STRING: I know that patting yourself on the back isn't good, but
it's equally not good to not be able to judge yourself
properly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd2
STRING: If there was no one like Ms. Cordell to compliment him,
I thought I could do it with confidence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: [Cordell] “You've worked hard in a short time as well,
Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1038
STRING: [Torta] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104e
STRING: I bowed deeply to Ms. Cordell, and thanked her again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105a
STRING: I had practiced the song Chris wrote after receiving it in
secret from her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1070
STRING: Unfortunately we ended up using my song, but I
couldn't thank her enough for helping me like she had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ac
STRING: [Chris] “In a short time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ca
STRING: [Cordell] “I said it before, didn't I? You've grasped what
you needed to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1106
STRING: [Cordell] “Regardless, I'm relieved. Just keep practicing
like that. But you're still far from perfect.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: [Chris] “We know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: [Torta] “So, we'll go back to practice now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1176
STRING: [Cordell] “Right. I guess I'll... go look for other students.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a8
STRING: [Chris] “Are you... bored, by any chance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c6
STRING: [Cordell] “Bored enough to watch students of mine
practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: She said this and smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, shall we continue?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1250
STRING: [Torta] “Right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1274
STRING: Chris said this with gusto, unlike how he'd been until
the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1280
STRING: He looked like he had gotten over something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128c
STRING: It was for me... Unfortunately I couldn't say that, but I
knew that Chris was dedicating himself seriously to
practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: Then... I looked away from Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c4
STRING: I regretted writing it in the letter, and I hated myself
because I'd probably write the same thing again.
